TopicTitle: Bug with cargo bays in build mode

Articles.Content:
\* KSP version 1.0.0.830 (though I also encounterd the bug in KSP 0.9 & 0.25)

\* Problem: 

 This is a part bug that affects all mk2 and mk3 cargo bays *(edit: and also the new service bays)*. In build mode, (both in the VAB and the SPH) when you attempt to use the offset tool on any part directly connected to an inner attachment node of a cargo bay, the part you're attempting to offset is instantly displaced along the X and Y axes. This makes it basically impossible to accurately offset parts inside a cargo bay.
